CustomField.formula: IF(No_of_parking__c > 0, Single_Covered_Additional_Amount__c + Tandem_Covered_Additional_Amount__c + Single_Open_Additional_Amount__c + Tandem_Open_Additional_Amount__c + Stilt_Additional_Amount__c + MLCP_Additional_Amount__c + Basement_Additional_Amount__c + Podium_Amount__c + Puzzle_Car_Park_Amount__c , 0)
CustomField.label: Total Car Park Amount
